Perhaps it's because he doesn't wash his ears.
He asked if the fully qualified person would come.
Does the teacher still accept it?
The teacher then beat him.
Dharma Succession of the Chan Master Huayan Jing

source_sentence: 鳳翔府紫陵匡一定覺禪師初到蟠龍。
translation: It was the first time the Chan Master Dukkak had arrived at Panglong, in Ziling's neighborhood in Fengxiang Province.
He met with a monk who asked, "The blue pond is as clear as a mirror.
"Where does this Coiling Dragon rest?
The dragon said.
"The sands are submerged, but I can't see the bottom.
The floating waves are barefoot.
The master refused.
The dragon asked the master to teach him the way.
The master said.
"The golden dragon penetrates far beyond the blue sky.
Is there a jade wheel in the pond that's stuck to the capacity of the jade wheel?
Long agreed.
After he stayed there, the monks asked.
"Before he became a human being, what did he do?
What was it that he did?" The master said.
'The stone bull walks in the fire every step of the way.
He looked back and rejoined the grass in the sun.
He asked, "The path of wisdom and consciousness is cut off.
What happens when deliberation is combined and forgotten?
The teacher said.
'I stopped being imprisoned and grew wisdom.
He recuperated from his illness and lost his body.
Jiufeng Pūrṇa Chan Master's Dharma Succession

source_sentence: 洪州同安院威禪師僧問。
translation: The monk asked, "Did Niutou meet the Fourth Patriarch when he hadn't yet seen him?
"What happened when Niutou hadn't yet seen the Fourth Patriarch?
The master said.
"The child of a sacred tree on the side of the road.
Those who saw him would raise their fists.
He said, "What happened after he saw them?
The teacher said.
'There's no spirit-seat inside the house.
"The whole family doesn't wear filial piety.
He asked whether the patriarch's intention was the same as the doctrinal intention, or whether it was different.
The teacher said.
"The jade rabbit never knew the meaning of dawn.
The golden crow strives for nighttime illumination.
He asked, "How is this the same song of peace?
The teacher said.
"The sacred lute isn't distinct from human sounds.
Would a soulmate ever cross the threshold of Boya?
He said, "We don't know who has harmonized it.
The teacher said.
"When the wooden horse neighs, I hear it from that side.
Who was it that heard it when the stone man clapped his hands?
He said.
'What happens when you meet a soulmate?'
The teacher said.
"A soulmate is not an earworm.
Would an accomplished person hear it at the same time?
One day, the teacher traveled to the mountains.
The large crowd followed.
The teacher said.
"The emerald bamboos are in front of the jambu.
The yellow flowers are below the masonry.
The ancients taught.
"It's truly like Prajñāpāramitā.
That's not the case in Tongan.
A monk said.
"Were the ancients or the monks good?
The master said.
'He didn't crave the taste of food and bait.'
He could be called Bitan Long.
He said that the eyes of the various directions weren't blamed on Yuanming.
The teacher said.
"The Ajātaśatru sits at mid-autumn with his eyes closed.
Yet he laughed at the moon's lack of light.
He said, "Yellow flowers are growing under the bamboo pavilion in front of the congregation.
What's the point of having them again?
The master said.
'The south of the country has yet to be subdued.
Did he descend from the north of the country?
The monks paid homage.
The teacher said.
"Your name is universally known.
The teacher asked the saṃgha.
"There's nowhere to hide after the evening meal.
Do you know if there's any truth to that?
He said, "Monk, how did it come about?
The teacher struck a whisk.
The monk said.
"A hand-to-hand combatant boasts of being a good fighter.
The master said.
"He's holding a whip and tilting his hat.
Is that a priest?
He asked where he could hide behind the ways of the present and past.
The teacher said.
"How did the preceptor give rise to this?
The monk took care and left.
The master said.
"I'm not here yet.
Dharma Succession of the Chan Master Tong of the Northern Courtyard

source_sentence: 京兆府香城和尚初參北院。
translation: The monk Xiangcheng of Jingzhao Prefecture first visited the North Temple.
He asked.
"What happened when it was like both?
The monk said.
'One is like earning your keep.'
The monk then had a thought.
The monk asked.
"The three views of the Buddha's radiance are grateful.
"What about the candle illumination?
The master said.
"The five colors are displayed in front of Morning Glory Peak.
He said, "What do you do when you're not involved in the matter of the five colors?
The teacher said.
'Now, I've come across the river especially for this.'
He asked the master to raise the song as he went up the road.
The master said.
"The fishing hook isn't coming out.
He asked Niutou if he still had the Fourth Patriarch's intention.
The master said.
"Suppose he dots down and drops a thousand words.
He said, "What happens after you put a dot down?
The teacher said.
"Put a separate pinch of it on display for humans and gods.
He said, "If that's the case, then everyone has them.
The teacher said.
"And what are you doing?
He asked, "There are no threads of ants tied up in a bag.
"The kitchen is cut off from the gathering of flies.

The teacher said.
'I abandon the world every day and don't seek it.

Wu Deng Yantong vol. 13
